sn35.43:1.5: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccam, rupa anicca, cakkhuvinnanam aniccam, cakkhusamphasso anicco.
sn35.43:1.6: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam …pe…
sn35.43:1.7: jivha anicca, rasa anicca, jivhavinnanam aniccam, jivhasamphasso anicco.
sn35.43:1.8: Yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam.
sn35.43:1.10: mano anicco, dhamma anicca, manovinnanam aniccam, manosamphasso anicco.
sn35.43:1.11: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam.
sn35.43:1.12: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati.
sn35.43:1.13: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.43:1.14: manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovinnanepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati,
sn35.43:1.15: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.43:1.16: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.43:1.17: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
